useCase.name: Change Marketing Campaign
useCase.description: Allow user to modify the marketing campaign type

preconditions.precondition: User has access to the marketing campaign module

failureEndConditions.condition: Unable to update marketing campaign type

useCase.trigger: User initiates a request to change marketing campaign type

mainSequence.step: User requests to change marketing campaign type
Retail UMP synchronously/asynchronously sends message to C
Retail UMP receives response from C
UMP receives response from Retail UMP
User receives confirmation of marketing campaign type update
